sentences.sContent: I spent a week at Kandersteg and could happily have lingered on.
sentences.sCn: 我在坎德施泰格逗留了一个星期，本来还可以开开心心地多待几天。

sentences.sContent: We lingered over breakfast on the terrace.
sentences.sCn: 我们在平台上慢条斯理地吃着早餐。

phrases.pCn: 在…上拖延；细细思考；仔细欣赏；慢吞吞地做某事

words.tran: 徘徊；缓慢消失；沉思（linger的ing形式）

trans.tranOther: to stay somewhere a little longer, especially because you do not want to leave
